item.title: 阿达尼公司将利用人工智能需求将数据中心投资额提高 100 亿美元
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，高塔姆-阿达尼（Gautam Adani）计划追加 100 亿美元投资，在印度建设数据中心，这位亿万富翁希望抓住人工智能和业务流程主导型服务需求激增的机遇。【原文：Gautam Adani plans to invest an additional $10 billion to build data centers in India, people familiar with the matter said, as the billionaire looks to ride the boom in demand for artificial intelligence and business process-led services.】

item.title: 阿美石油公司与中国比亚迪达成协议，探索新型电动汽车技术
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯国家石油公司和中国主要电动汽车制造商之一同意探讨在新能源汽车技术方面开展更紧密的合作，此举将使世界上最大的原油出口国和消费国携手引领移动领域的变革。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s state oil company and one of China’s main electric carmakers agreed to explore closer collaboration on new energy vehicle technology, a move that would bring the world’s biggest crude exporter and consumer together to navigate changes in mobility.】

item.title: 中国出口导向型增长使经济面临更严重的关税冲击
item.description: 中国第一季度强于预期的经济增长掩盖了一个关键的弱点：对国外需求的依赖性越来越大，这增加了贸易紧张局势加剧对经济造成更严重打击的威胁。【原文：China’s stronger-than-expected growth in the first quarter masks a key vulnerability: a growing dependence on foreign demand, which increases the threat of a sharper economic hit as trade tensions soar.】

item.title: 俄罗斯预计今年出口减少、油价下跌
item.description: 俄罗斯下调了今年的出口展望，并降低了对石油价格的预期，这可能会迫使政府动用财富基金来支付战时开支。【原文：Russia downgraded its outlook for exports this year and lowered expectations for the price for its oil, developments that may force the government to dip into its wealth fund to cover wartime spending.】

item.title: CATL 在上海科技日上发布电动汽车电池技术进展
item.description: 全球最大的电动汽车电池生产商当代安培雷克斯科技有限公司（Amperex Technology Co.全球最大的电动汽车电池生产商安培雷斯科技有限公司（Amperex Technology Co., Ltd.）发布了其最新款的电池产品，大力宣传其产品的耐用性和续航能力，因为电动汽车在人们心目中的局限性仍然阻碍着许多消费者改用电动汽车。【原文：Contemporary Amperex Technology Co. Ltd., the world’s biggest producer of batteries for electric vehicles, unveiled the latest versions of its cells, playing up the durability and range of its products as the perceived limits of EVs still stop many consumers from making the switch.】

item.description:

item.description: 奇货可居：马丁-沃尔夫谈特朗普重塑世界贸易（播客）【原文：Odd Lots: Martin Wolf on Trump’s Remake of World Trade (Podcast)】

item.title: 英伟达首席执行官游说日本提供更多电力和数据中心以推动人工智能发展
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.首席执行官黄仁勋周一会见了日本首相石破茂，推动增加发电量以满足人工智能的需求。【原文：Nvidia Corp. Chief Executive Officer Jensen Huang met with Japanese Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba on Monday to push for more electricity generation to meet artificial intelligence’s needs.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利的威尔逊说，美国利润前景很少如此黯淡
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）的迈克尔-威尔逊（Michael Wilson）表示，由于经济严重放缓的风险，分析师们正忙于削减美国的盈利预期。【原文：Analysts are busy slashing earnings estimates in the US due to the risk of a severe economic slowdown, according to Morgan Stanley’s Michael Wilson.】

item.title: 印度股市迎来 2021 年初以来最大的五日反弹
item.description: 印度股市连续第五个交易日上涨，反映出投资者继续乐观地认为，印度市场将为美国总统唐纳德-特朗普不断升级的贸易战提供一个相对的避风港。【原文：Indian stocks rose for a fifth straight session, reflecting continued investor optimism that the market would offer a relative haven from US President Donald Trump’s escalating trade war.】

item.title: 对冲基金抢购日元汇率交易员，关税震撼市场
item.description: 在关税引发的动荡席卷日本政府债券市场之际，两家对冲基金正在从全球银行招聘日元汇率交易员。【原文：A pair of hedge funds are hiring yen rates traders from global banks, even as tariff-induced turmoil sweeps the Japanese government bond market.】

item.title: 印度财政部长本周将在贸易谈判期间会见贝森特
item.description: 印度财政部长尼尔马拉-西塔拉曼（Nirmala Sitharaman）本周将在华盛顿会见美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent），两国距离今年晚些时候达成贸易协定的时间越来越近。【原文：India’s Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman will meet US Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent in Washington this week, as the two nations inch closer to sealing a trade pact later this year.】

item.title: 石破称日本不会在美国关税谈判中一味让步
item.description: 日本首相石破茂表示，日本不会一味屈从美国的要求，就关税问题达成协议，这是自唐纳德-特朗普总统发起全球贸易战以来，他发表的最具战斗性的言论。【原文：Japan won’t just keep conceding to US demands to reach a deal over tariffs, Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba said, in some of his most combative remarks since President Donald Trump launched a push for more access to Tokyo’s sensitive auto and agricultural sectors as part of his global trade war.】

item.title: 中国远洋称美国征税有可能破坏全球航运稳定
item.description: 中国最大的航运公司周一表示，特朗普政府计划对停靠美国港口的中国船只征税，这将削弱全球贸易和供应链的稳定性。【原文：China’s largest shipping line said on Monday that the Trump administration’s plan to impose levies on Chinese vessels docking at US ports would erode stability in global trade and supply chains.】

item.title: 关税冲击经济，美韩将进行贸易谈判
item.description: 韩国和美国将于本周启动贸易谈判，因为这个亚洲出口大国正努力说服唐纳德-特朗普政府放宽已开始对韩国经济造成影响的惩罚性征税。【原文：South Korea and the US will kick off trade negotiations this week as the Asian export powerhouse seeks to persuade Donald Trump’s administration to ease the punitive levies that are starting to bite the economy.】

item.title: 欧洲央行穆勒警告关税和德国支出可能会刺激通胀
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员马迪斯-穆勒警告说，美国的贸易关税和德国公共支出的增加可能会刺激通货膨胀。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Madis Muller warned that US trade tariffs and higher public spending in Germany could stoke inflation.】

item.title: 美联储忧虑打压美元，新兴市场货币上涨
item.description: 由于对美联储独立性的担忧，美元继续回落，新兴市场货币上涨。【原文：Emerging market currencies rose as the dollar continued to retreat amid worries over the independence of the Federal Reserve.】

item.title: 贸易紧张局势加剧，中国削减美国大宗商品采购量
item.description: 随着世界上最大的两个经济体之间的贸易战愈演愈烈，中国上个月大幅减少了对美国许多商品的进口，在某些情况下甚至降至零。【原文：China sharply reduced imports of many US commodities last month, in some cases to zero, as the trade war between the world’s two biggest economies intensified.】

item.title: 日本执政党将就关税问题提出紧急提案
item.description: 据彭博社看到的文件显示，执政党自民党周一将在美国加征关税后提出一项紧急提案，敦促政府加强对企业的贷款支持并刺激内需。【原文：The ruling Liberal Democratic Party on Monday is set to make an emergency proposal in the wake of the US tariffs, urging the government to strengthen loan support for companies and boost domestic demand, according to documents seen by Bloomberg.】

item.title: 印度银行业因低关税而创下历史新高
item.description: 印度贷款机构的股价创下历史新高，原因是该行业相对不受关税相关动荡的影响，因此投资者继续看好该行业。【原文：A gauge of Indian lenders’ shares rose to a record, as investors remain bullish on the sector due to its relative insulation to the tariff-related turmoil.】

item.title: 台积电警告称其人工智能芯片对华出口能力有限
item.description: 台湾积体电路制造股份有限公司（Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.【原文：Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co. listed the challenges of ensuring export control compliance by its customers, months after the company’s artificial intelligence silicon was found to have flowed to US-sanctioned Huawei Technologies Co. via intermediaries.】

item.title: 说 "你被解雇了"，看看会发生什么
item.description:
现在解雇鲍威尔可能会引发一场史诗般的金融危机。最好等他的任期结束。【原文：

Sacking Powell now could trigger an epic financial crisis. Best to wait for his term to end.

item.title: 海关数据显示中国在贸易战中停止进口美国液化天然气
item.description: 由于两个最大经济体之间的贸易战改变了航运路线，中国对美国液化天然气的购买量在前两个月急剧下降后，在 3 月份骤降至零。【原文：China’s purchases of US liquefied natural gas plunged to zero in March after a sharp decline in the previous two months, as the trade war between the two biggest economies alters shipping routes.】

item.title: 信托业陷入困境，另一家中国影子银行寻求国家帮助
item.description: 中国国有中航信托公司在推迟支付部分投资产品的款项后，正在向两家同行寻求援助，这表明中国 3.7 万亿美元信托业的问题正在恶化。【原文：China’s state-owned AVIC Trust Co. is seeking assistance from two of its peers after delaying payments on some of its investment products, a sign of worsening problems in the country’s $3.7 trillion trust industry.】

item.title: 特朗普力挺鲍威尔，美元走软，比特币反弹
item.description: 比特币反弹至唐纳德-特朗普宣布 "解放日 "关税以来的最高水平，因为人们再次担心美国总统会罢免美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell），导致美元汇率下滑。【原文：Bitcoin rallied to its highest level since Donald Trump’s “Liberation Day” tariff announcements as the dollar slumped amid renewed fears over the US president’s efforts to remove Federal Reserve Chairman Jerome Powell.】

item.title: 世界经济首脑将在华盛顿面对特朗普的贸易战
item.description: 世界经济和金融首脑们希望为百年来最严重的全球贸易危机找到一条出路。本周，他们将前往危机的中心。【原文：World economic and finance chiefs want an off-ramp from the worst global trade crisis in a century. This week they’re heading toward its epicenter.】

item.title: 价格飙升，日本二十年来首次购买韩国大米
item.description: 日本大米价格飙升，为韩国生产商出口主食打开了一扇难得的机会之窗。【原文：Japan’s surging rice prices have opened a rare window of opportunity for South Korean producers to export the staple food.】

item.title: 大亨称特朗普关税可能损害菲律宾的贸易伙伴
item.description: 菲律宾亿万富翁海梅-奥古斯托-佐贝尔-德-阿亚拉（Jaime Augusto Zobel de Ayala）说，相对于本地区其他国家，东南亚国家可能从美国降低关税中获得的任何好处，都可能因美国对其一些贸易伙伴征税的影响而受到限制。【原文：Philippine billionaire Jaime Augusto Zobel de Ayala said any benefit that the Southeast Asian nation may have from the lower US tariffs relative to its regional peers may be limited by the impact of the levies on some of its trade partners.】

item.title: 京东将在中国增加 10 万名外卖骑手，与美团一较高下
item.description: JD.com Inc.计划在未来三个月内增加10万名全职骑手，在与市场领导者美团的竞争白热化之际，扩大其食品外卖业务。【原文：JD.com Inc. plans to add 100,000 full-time riders within the next three months, amplifying its food delivery push as competition against market leader Meituan heats up.】

item.title: 日本超长期债券因避险需求吸引创纪录外资流入
item.description: 上个月，日本超长期政府债券吸引了创纪录的外资流入，原因是美国关税政策导致避险情绪升温，增强了这种证券作为避风港的吸引力。【原文：Japanese super-long government bonds drew a record foreign inflow last month as heightened risk aversion amid US tariff policy burnished the securities’ allure as a haven.】
